address: 112 Madison Ave, 10th Floor, New York, NY 10016
valueProp: The New York City personal injury attorneys of Hach & Rose, LLP, are dedicated to vigorously protecting the rights and interests of those who have been hurt due to the negligence or recklessness of another party. For more than a decade, Michael Rose and Gregory Hach have dedicated their careers to representing New Yorkers and have partnered to create a law firm that has recovered well in excess of five hundred million dollars on behalf of their clients. If you have a personal injury claim, contact Michael Rose and Gregory Hach today.
